loans.name: Renante

texts.en:
Renante is a 46-years-old married man and a father of four children. He resides with his family in Concepcion, Iloilo. 

Renante is a chainsaw operator. He has been in the business for more than 4 years now. This is the source of his income. Renante is asking for a loan to pay for the repair of the chainsaw and to buy piglets to raise. With this, he will be able to improve his business as well as his income.

In the future, Renante wants to invest more on the same business so that it will generate the revenue necessary for the needs of the family especially for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to pay for the repair of the chainsaw machine and to buy piglets to raise.

loans.name: Remedios

texts.en:
Remedios is happily married to her husband. She is a good role model to her children. She and her husband work hard to fulfill the needs of their children. They want their children to finish their studies and become successful to their life. 

Remedios and her husband grow pineapple fruits on their farm. To ensure that their crops are in good condition, they often have to visit their farm. Remedios is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 25,000 for the maintenance of their pineapple fruit crops. She will use the loan wisely for the development of their crops and lifestyle as well.

loans.use: with the maintenance of their pineapple fruit crops.

loans.name: Leonil

texts.en:
Leonil, age 27, is a fisherman from Mcarthur, Leyte. He is a single man. He earns a living by fishing. He catches and sells fish to the people in the community. He has been fishing for two years now. To augment his income, he also raises and sells hogs.

Leonil is asking for a loan of 25,000 PHP to purchase additional pigs and a fishing net. These materials will be beneficial for improving the yield of his fishing livelihood and improve his way of raising hogs.
 
In the future, Leonil a dreams to expand his business for a sustainable living.

loans.use: to purchase additional pigs and a fishing net.

loans.name: Hortencia

texts.en:
Hortencia is an industrious woman who engages in raising and selling hogs. She is a 55-year-old married woman with four children from Mcarthur, Leyte.  Two of her children are still attending school. Aside from hog raising, she operates a multicab, which transports passengers from one place to another.

Hortencia is asking for a loan of 35,000 PHP to buy an additional 10 piglets and pay for maintenance of her multicab. This will help Hortencia raise and sell more pigs. This will also help maintain the smooth operation of her multicab transportation business. 
 
In the future, Hortencia hopes that she can manage both her livelihoods that would definitely improve the family's living condition.

loans.use: to buy an additional 10 piglets and pay for  maintenance on her multicab

loans.name: Nurdin

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Nurdin, one of the Ruma agents who live in Tangerang. Tangerang is a city located at the south of Jakarta. In the photo, Nurdin is posing with his beautiful six-year-old daughter. His wife is a stay-at-home mom. As the head of the family, Nurdin’s main job is an employee at a small company in Jakarta, but as a side job he also sells mobile phone airtime credits and services utility bill payments to his surrounding community. He started out with this business since he joined Ruma about four months ago. He was excited to become a Ruma agent, because not only it gives additional income, but he also learned about utilizing technology to give access to mobile payment services to people in the peri-urban area where he lives now.  

As the business runs, Nurdin is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits and utility bill payments transactions, especially on the weekends. 

In the future, Nurdin plans to improve the new product he serves, which is ‘e-commerce’ for low income communities. This is a new business model from Ruma that aims to help people get access to good quality products with better prices. The product ranges from fashion products, house and kitchenwares, to gadgets and school supplies. To buy one, people only have to pick what they want to buy from the product list in the catalogue. After that, they can go to Nurdin or any other certified Ruma agent nearby their houses to make the order and payment. The product will be delivered right to the customer’s door.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in his community

loans.name: Martha Margarita

texts.es:
Martha es una viuda de 58 años de edad, no tiene hijos lo único que tiene es su tienda con lo que genera los recursos suficientes para sus sustento, para ella esta tienda lo es todo pues desde el fallecimiento de su esposo no solo encontró un medio de sostenimiento si no de entretenimiento despejando su mente.
El negocio lo monto sola, ante la necesidad de generar recursos para no aguantar hambre y pasar por necesidades infrahumanas.
Con la ayuda de un crédito Martha quiere mejorar su negocio invirtiendo en variedad de surtido de granos, víveres y gaseosas que no dispone, una de sus mayores dificultades es  que los clientes prefieren una marca y con la ayuda del crédito Martha comprara esos productos tan solicitados que ahora no tiene.
Martha espera tu ayuda, es una mujer soltera acompáñala
texts.en:
Martha is a 58-year old widow who does not have children. The only thing she has is her store, with which she generates enough income to support herself. This store is everything to her, because after her husband's passing, she found not only a means of support but also of entertainment to clear her mind.

She started the business alone, out of a need to generate earnings in order not to go hungry and live under subhuman conditions. With the help of a loan, Martha wants to improve her business, investing in a variety of grains, basic needs, and soft drinks that she doesn't have.

One of her greatest difficulties is that her customers prefer one brand, and with the help of the loan, Martha will buy these highly-demanded products that she currently doesn't have.

Martha hopes for your help. She is a single woman; walk with her.

loans.use: to buy a stock of grains, basic needs, and soft drinks.  She is a woman who took over the home when her husband passed away.

loans.name: Ratin

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Ratin. Ratin lives in Tangerang, a city located at the south of Jakarta. In the photo, Ratin is holding a Ruma banner in her house. 

Ratin is happily married, and she and her husband have been blessed with a three-year-old son. Ratin’s husband runs a small business, an internet café, to support his family. Meanwhile, to support her family’s income, Ratin also works as a staff at a paintball arena. Ratin is an energetic mom--she has a bunch of friends and she is a hardworking person. 

Two years ago, Ratin was introduced to Ruma by a Ruma field staff, and she joined Ruma not long after. She was excited to become a Ruma agent because she wanted to learn to start out at a business which is selling mobile phone airtime credits and serving utility bill payments for her customers. Her easygoing and cheerful personality makes people comfortable doing transactions with her; she is trusted to become a mobile payment service provider in her community. 

As the business runs, Ratin is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. She will use the capital to process more mobile airtime credits and utility bill payment transactions, especially on the weekends. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to provide more mobile services in her community

loans.name: Farid Enrique

texts.es:
Farid un hombre de 38 años de edad dedicado a la reparación y mantenimiento de aparatos electrodomésticos, se localiza en un local en la zona de carepa que es un sitio golpeado por la violencia y la extrema pobreza.
Inicio su negocio por gusto y vocación al trabajo independiente, para este negocios e preparo y no se lanzó a si sin tener algún conocimiento, tomo clases, se capacito y está preparado para atender cualquier emergencia. 
Farid solicita un crédito para la compra de repuesto electrodomésticos, es un hombre que quiere cambiar la realidad de su pueblo, demostrar que con trabajo puede salir adelante.
texts.en:
Farid is a 38-year-old man who makes a living by repairing and maintaining home appliances. His business is located in a shop in the Carepa area, which is a place struck by violence and extreme poverty. He started his business because of his own interests and his regard for independent work. He prepared himself for the business and went ahead without any previous knowledge. He took courses, trained himself and is prepared for any emergency.

Farid is requesting a loan to buy spare parts for home appliances. He is a man who wants to change the reality of his town, proving that one can get ahed with hard work.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for home appliances of all types

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a 90kg pig to prepare and then distribute the meat among his neighbours.

loans.name: Mango Group

texts.en:
Stamili is in her mid-20s, married and has three schooling kids. She has had a genge selling fruits and vegetables for six months. Her business is still new. She prefers this business since it is easier to manage, realizes a good profit and at the same time, she is able to care for her family. Stamili works from 8 am to 8:30 pm per working day and is able to make a good return per month. 

This is her first loan request from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will invest this loan to improve her business with new stock of fruits and vegetables that are demanded. She will buy fruits and vegetables to resell in her genge. In the coming days, she would like her business to be of good appearance (managing big stock). Stamili will share this loan with her loan group "MANGO", which totals five members. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to resell in her genge

loans.name: Martha Azucena

texts.es:
Un negocio de confecciones es el que le ha ayudado a la señora Martha a poder generar los recursos necesario para el sustento de sus 3 hijos pues es madre soltera cabeza de familia y todo lo que ven en la foto es resultado de noches de trasnocho, largas jornadas laborales.
Martha inicio sui negocio pro gusto y vocación al trabajo independiente, aprendió sola de este arte y de ella depende madres cabeza de familia que han encontrado en Martha un apoyo enorme, en verdad es bella esta labor social que desempeña Martha.
Martha sabe que la temporada de diciembre es la de mayor movimiento en el mercado por ello quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de telas que ella junto con sus madres cabezas de familia convertirán en atrevidos y novedosos diseños, blusas, camisas, camisetas y ropa interior es lo que piensa confeccionar.
Su mayor sueño es poder un día comprar un casa propia
texts.en:
Martha has been able to generate the necessary resources in order to support her three children through her garment manufacturing business. She is a single mother, head-of-household, and everything you see in the photograph is the result of her staying up all night, working long hours.

It was Martha’s decision to open her business and work independently. She taught herself the art of this trade. Martha has been an enormous support to mothers who are single and household heads, truly performing social initiatives.

Martha knows that the December season is the busiest time of the year. She wants a loan in order to buy fabric that she, with the mothers who are single and household heads, can make into bold and fashionable designs: blouses, shirts, and underwear is what she is thinking of making.

Her biggest dream is to be able to buy her own house some day.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of fabric in order to design blouses, shirts, and underwear.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta lives in the town of Mcarthur, Leyte. She is a 44-year-old married woman with seven children. Her oldest child is 19 and the youngest is two years old. She operates a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various items including noodles, canned goods, biscuits, soft drinks and beverages. Her husband earns a living by fishing. He sells fish. 

Julieta is asking for a loan of 30,000 PHP to purchase fishing materials like fishing net and assorted groceries for the store.  These tools will help improve Julieta's store filled with stock and improve her husband's yield in the coming months. With these, she could purchase healthy foods and have a better living condition.

She is hoping that she can handle her current sources of income profitably, so that she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase fishing materials like fishing net and assorted groceries for the store

loans.name: Jumhadi

texts.en:
Hello, lenders! Meet Jumhadi, a newly joined Ruma agent who lives in Tangerang. Tangerang is a city located at the south of Jakarta. As a main source of income, Jumhadi is cooking and serving an Indonesian dish called "Ketupat Sayur": a mix of rice cake, vegetables, egg, and chicken, cooked in light curry. He sells the dish by using a moving cart. 

Jumhadi is happily married, and he and his wife have been blessed with a beautiful 2-year-old daughter. Jumhadi joined Ruma two months ago because he wanted to try out selling mobile phone airtime credits and providing a utility bill payment service to his customers. He is excited about his new business and he is quickly learning about how to improve his business using mobile technology. Jumhadi has an advantage in selling such services because of his experience serving his loyal Ketupat Sayur customers. 

As the business runs, Jumhadi is hoping to get a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to process more mobile phone airtime credits and utility bill payment transactions, especially on the weekends. In the photograph, Jumhadi is standing in front of his house, which has been decorated with lots of Ruma merchandise.
 
He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone airtime credits and utility bill payment transactions

loans.name: Matilde Fidelino

texts.es:
Matilde, de 39 años de edad, estudió hasta el tercer grado en la comunidad donde reside, ya no pudo continuar con sus estudios debido a la guerra que sufrió el país, se creció con sus padres trabajando en la agricultura. Es padre de cuatro hijos a quienes aun apoya económicamente, se acompaño hace ya muchos años y su compañera de vida trabaja en los oficios domésticos, y le apoya en la granja familiar que tienen.

Desde los trece años su padre lo puso a trabajar en la agricultura sembrando maíz, frijoles y maicillo, luego el emigró por un tiempo al extranjero, donde trabajo en construcción y en restaurantes de comunidad.- Hoy en día el se dedica a la crianza de pollos de engorde y la crianza de cerdos así como también en la siembre de los granos básicos, trabaja todos los días, su esposa le apoya en el cuido de los cerdos y de los pollos de engorde, mientras el labora con sus hijos en la agricultura, por las tardes al regresar a su casa apoya también en el manejo de los pollos. Actualmente, el trabaja con doscientos pollos de engorde los cuales vende en la comunidad y encargos que le hacen.

Matilde, solicita el crédito en la institución para la compra de doscientos pollos de engorde y también para comprar 16 quintales de concentrado.- Invertirá $512.00 lo cual le servirá para el manejo de los pollos, el pretende venderlos en época de navidad y en enero cuando la demanda se incrementa considerablemente, así el podrá obtener buenos márgenes de ganancia en las ventas que espera realizar y con ello seguir creciendo poco a poco con su granja. Y de esa manera espera darle mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.

El sueño de Matilde es, comprar un molino pues en la comunidad no hay y las personas tienen que caminar un largo trayecto para ir a moler el maíz para hacer las tortillas.
texts.en:
Matilde is 39 years old and studied until third grade in the community where he lives. He was unable to continue his education because his country was suffering through a war. He grew up with his parents, working in agriculture. He is the father of 4 children who he still supports financially. He has been in a relationship for years and his companion works as a homemaker and helps out with their family farm. 

His father put him to work at age 13, planting corn, beans and millet. He emigrated to another country for a time, where he worked in construction and in local restaurants. Today, he spends his time raising broilers and pigs as well as growing basic grains. He works every day; his wife helps out with the raising of the pigs and chickens, while he works with his children in farming. In the afternoons, when he gets home, he helps out with the chickens. He currently works with 200 broilers, which he sells in the community and to fill custom orders. 

Matilde is requesting a loan at the bank to buy 200 broiler chickens and also to buy 16 quintals of concentrate. He will invest $512.00 in the care of the broilers; he intends to sell them over the Christmas season and in January when the demand goes up significantly. That way he will be able to get a good margin of profit on the sales he hopes to make and with those profits, he will continue to grow his farm, little by little. That way he hopes to give his family better living conditions. 

Matilde's dream is to buy a mill as there isn't one in his community and the residents have to walk a long distance to grind the corn to make tortillas.

loans.use: To buy 200 broiler chickens and also to buy 16 quintals of concentrate.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a plow for his land.

loans.name: Gloria Elena

texts.es:
Ella es gloria una mujer humilde, trabajadora, honrada echada para adelante que con su negocio de venta de pescado ha logrado superar diversas adversidades que se le han presentado como lo fue el abandono de su esposo, quedando a cargo de dos hijas de 8 y 15 años de edad.
Gloria quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de pescado, para salir de su casa cargando la canasta que ven en la foto buscando una oportunidad de venta y regresar en la noche a la casa para darles a sus hijas un bocado de comida.
texts.en:
Gloria is a humble, hardworking and honest woman. Her business of selling fish has helped her move forward in life and overcome several adversities such as being abandoned by her husband and raising her two young daughters ages 8 and 15.

Glora is asking for a loan in order to purchase fish, which she sells from a basket (as seen in the photo) looking for sales opportunities and to return home at night in order give her daughters a bit of food.

loans.use: to buy fish that she sells in the morning as a street vendor.

loans.name: Amaury Jose

texts.es:
Amaury es un hombre soltero del sector de Sincelejo que se gana la vida vendiendo copos para los oídos y algodones, es una actividad poco común en el sector de Sincelejo pues es una zona cocida más por su agricultura y ganadería que por este tipo de actividades, siendo pionero y el único que oferta este servicio. 
Amaury busca incrementar sus clientes, aumentar sus clientes por ello solicita un crédito para la compra de algodón, empaques de topos y surtido de topos para oídos en general.
Su sueño es estudiar, capacitarse buscar mejores oportunidades de trabajo.
Amaury espera tu ayuda,  apoya la innovación
texts.en:
Amaury is single and lives in Sincelejo, a region known for farming and ranching. Amaury makes a living at a business that is unusual in Sincelejo: he sells 
cotton swabs for ears and cotton balls. He is a pioneer, and the only person in the area who offers this service. 

Amaury wants to increase his customer base, and is applying for a loan so that he can purchase and swabs. He hopes to study and train himself so that he can look for better work opportunities. 

Amaury is waiting for your help - please support his innovation.

loans.use: to purchase a supply of cotton and ear swabs. Amaury is the only person in Sincelejo who sells these products.

loans.name: Sakina

texts.en: Sakina is a married woman. She is a mother of three children. One of her son's is standing with her in the picture. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years. He drives a rickshaw to meet the day-to-day expenditures of his family. But due to some maintenance issues, he is not able to provide services to more customers and ultimately earns less profit. Therefore, Sakina has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR for her son. He will use this loan amount to repair his rickshaw to provide better service to his customers. This will help him to generate more income for the betterment of his family.

loans.use: to repair her son's rickshaw to provide better services to the customers

loans.name: Kaneez

texts.en: Kaneez is a 37-year-old married woman. She has eight children. She is in the business of selling different edibles with her husband at the corner of her house. Over time, she has become popular on her street for providing good quality products. In order to meet the demands of her customers time after time, Kaneez has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR to buy additional packs of salt, biscuit, tea, sugar, toffee, etc. in order to increase revenue and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional packs of salt, biscuit, tea, sugar, toffee, etc. in order to increase revenue and expand her business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his car.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is a married man with eight children. He is forty-three year old residing in Mcarthur, Leyte. His oldest child is 22 while the youngest is 2 year old respectively. He operates a motorcycle transport service. He transports passengers from one place to remote areas, and his income comes from charging a fee for each ride.

Mario has requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to support his second business: rice farming. He will use the funds to buy supplies for his farm such as fertilizer, rice seedlings and pesticide. These are very helpful tools in improving his farming business and should allow him to grow and sell more rice, thus earning more income. This boost in income should allow Mario to provide his family with nutritious meals.

Mario would like to expand both his motorcycle and farming businesses to be prosperous, as this could help him finance the schooling of his children for a better tomorrow.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, rice seedlings, pesticide and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Domingo

texts.en:
Domingo is a 42 year old married man from Iloilo, Philippines. He has earned a living through his hog raising business for more than 4 years now.
Domingo wants to raise more pigs, but he lacks the funds to do so. He is requesting a loan to buy more piglets to raise, and animal feed to help them grow. This loan will help him improve his hog raising business and increase his profit and income.

In the future, Domingo hopes to increase the sustainability and productivity of his business.

loans.use: to buy more piglets to raise and feed for them to eat.

loans.name: Nubia De Jesus

texts.es:
Nubia es una mujer con un feliz matrimonio del cual nacieron dos hermosas hijas que ya son mayores de edad. Desde el año 2009 inicio con su negocio de confección directa donde genera un empleo, aprendió gracias a su madre y las enseñanzas los complementos con capacitaciones que tomo.
Nubia tiene un proyecto para su negocio el cual es comenzar a innovar  diversificando su oferta por ello pide la ayuda para ejecutar este plan.
Solicita formalmente un crédito para la compra de telas, adornos, hilos para iniciar la confección de camisas y prendas íntimas.
El sueño de Nubia es poder generar empleo, tener un taller más grande y mejorar sus condiciones d vivienda.
texts.en:
Nubia is a woman in a happy marriage from which she has two grown up daughters. She started her sewing business in 2009 which has given her a job. She learned this from her mother and she supplements these teachings with training that she has taken. 
Nubia has a plan for her business which is to start to innovate by diversifying what she offers. To do this she is asking for help to carry out this plan. She is asking for a loan to buy fabric, decorations and thread to start sewing shirts and underwear.
Nubia's dream is to be able to create employment, have a bigger workshop and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabric, decorations and thread to start sewing shirts and underwear.

loans.name: Gustavo De Jesus

texts.es:
Gustavo es un hombre soltero dedicado a la venta de productos de la canasta familiar, actividad que adopto por necesidad económica y que aprendió solo empíricamente.
Su falta de capital ha hecho que su tienda se venga abajo pues no tiene con qué surtirla y hoy en día cuenta con muy poca existencia de productos, ocasionando que sus clientes vayan a otras tiendas al no tener casi productos para vender.
Este necesitado hombre solicita un crédito para surtir su negocio comprando variedad en víveres granos, abarrotes.
Gustavo espera tu ayuda, que esperas.
texts.en: Gustavo is a single man dedicated to selling groceries, and activity he adopted by economic necessity and a business he taught himself. His lack of capital has slowed down his store because he doesn't have enough merchandise in stock and today he says that there are very few products so occasionally his customers to go other stores if he doesn't have products to sell. This needy man seeks a loan to buy a variety of grains and groceries. Gustavo is hoping for your help; what are you hoping for.

loans.use: to buy stock for his store, for because of economic problems it is not well-stocked and every day that passes he loses more customers because of this problem

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz es una viuda de 59 años de edad que inicio con su tienda de productos de la canasta familiar en los años 90 para suplir sus necesidades básicas, es madre de un hijo mayor de edad y solo tiene su tienda para generar sus propios recursos.
Luz mira su competencia y ve que tienen mayor variedad de productos, incluso un congelador donde vende productos refrigerados y frente a ellos se ve en desventaja, por tal razón solicita un crédito para la compra de un congelador y surtido en productos de refrigeración.
La ayuda de este crédito no solo ayuda a diversificar su oferta si no que la colocara a la par con la competencia, aumentando sus clientes y ventas.
texts.en: Luz is a 59 year old widow that opened a store that sells general groceries in the 1990s in order to supply her basic necessities. She is the mother of one grown son and only has her store to generate her own income. Luz looks at her competition and sees that they have a greater variety of products, including a freezer where refrigerated products are sold so that puts her at a disadvantage. So she seeks a loan to buy a freezer and stock up on refrigerated products. This loan will help not only diversify her products but also will put her on par with her competition, increasing her customers and sales.

loans.use: to buy a freezer as her store doesn't have one and she wants to sell refrigerated products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator for the house.

loans.name: Nuria Rosa

texts.es:
Nuri es una mujer casada, madre de 3 hijos de 18, 16 y 10 años de edad a los que espera poder matricularlos el otro año en una escuela y al más grande pues sacar un préstamo y pagarle una universidad.
Se desempeña como vendedora de alimentos en un carro de comida que ubica afuera de su casa, prepara perros calientes, hamburguesas, butifarras, papas fritas, entre otros.
Aprendió del negocio gracias a su hermana y desde entonces ha sido independiente.
Nuri quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de una freidora, surtido de alimentos y utensilios, espera tener buen volumen de ventas puesto que ya salieron a vacaciones los estudiantes.
Su sueño es poder tener un local comercial propio lleno de clientes.
texts.en: Nuri is a married woman, mother of three children ages 18, 16, and 10 years old. She hopes to enroll them in school for another year and take out a loan to pay for the oldest child's college tuition. She works as a food vendor in a food car that is located outside her home. She prepares hot dogs, hamburgers, french fries, and other items. She learned the business thanks to her sister and since then she has been independent. Nuri wants to ask for a loan to buy a fryer, a stock of food and utensils, and she hopes to have a good volume of sales as the students have left on vacation. Her dream is to be able to have a commercial location of her own full of customers.

loans.use: to buy a stock of food, meat, salads, breads, and utensils.

loans.name: May

texts.en:
May is a 20-year-old fish vendor. She earns a living by selling fresh fish. She is a married woman with a two-year-old son. She lives in Mayorga, Leyte. Her husband's occupation is a laborer. She has been a fish vendor for three years now. To have an additional source of income, she operates a sari-sari (variety) store, selling a variety of merchandise like coffee, biscuits, soap, canned goods and beverages. She also does farming. She only toils the land and grows rice during the season of planting.

May has requested a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy additional stocks of fish and farm supplies like fertilizers. She can now maximize all the tools, especially in augmenting her daily income. In the coming months, she can start to cultivate her farm.

May is hoping that she can handle her current business, as it can lead to sustainable living in the near future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of fish and farm supplies like fertilizers

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is a 36-year-old married man and a father of two children from Iloilo, Philippines. He runs a carenderia or eatery in his place, selling home-cooked food to his customers. Mario has been in the business for more than eight years now.

Mario is asking to take a loan to buy more ingredients for cooking like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, rice and other items. This loan will allow him to cook more and sell more to his customers.

In the future, Mario hopes to make his business a success. Moreover, he wants to save money for his children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for cooking like meat, vegetables, cooking oil and condiments, rice and other items

loans.name: Yessica Yulieth A

texts.es:
Yesica es una hermosa morena de 22 años de edad que tiene un salón de belleza que ha venido posicionando en el barrio con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo, inicio su trabajo pues siempre le ha apasionado el arreglo del cabello, lo demostraba en su etapa de colegio y viendo que es muy joven tiene expectativas de progreso y se siente muy motivada al saber que interactuar será la primera empresa que confiara en ella para desembolsar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido que son productos para el cuidado del cabello y la atención al cliente y mejora de activos fijos como lo es una plancha y secador más potente. 
Con la ayuda de este crédito podrá mejorar sus tiempos de atención pues los implementos nuevos son mas potentes y cuidan mejor el cabello de sus usuarios.
Es una mujer que vive con su pareja y su meta es ir mejorando las condiciones de su casa.
texts.en: Yesica is a beautiful 22 year old brunette who has a beauty salon that she opened in her neighborhood with great sacrifice and effort. She started her work as she has always enjoyed doing hair. She demonstrated an affinity to this profession in high school and seeing that she is very young she has expectations to grow and she is very motivated to know that Interactuar will be the first business to express confidence in her to give her a loan to invest in buying a stock of products for hair care and customer service and improve fixed items such as a more powerful curling iron and hair dryer. With the help of this loan she will be able to improve her attention to her customers as the new instruments are more powerful and provide better care for her customers' hair. She is a woman who lives with her partner and her goal is to improve the living conditions of her home.

loans.use: to buy new tools such as a dryer and curling iron that are more powerful.

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
This is Teresita. She is 56 years old, and a resident of Batasan, Quezon City, Philippines. She is married to Roger, her business partner, and is a mother to her children. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating the business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for her everyday expenses.

Teresita operates a food stall. In the Philippines, the whole working community and most of the families only eat home-cooked meals during evenings, where all of the family members are at home to take part of the meal. This is not only a usual family tradition, but a matter of convenience and frugal living. It is considered a waste of money and time to spend cooking gas and food for one to two persons, when buying cooked rice and viands cost less than raw food. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community.  She earns a minimum of PHP 1,000 in sales every day. Aside from her food stall, Teresita also operates a tailoring shop, where she likewise profits well.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 20,000 loan. She will be utilizing the loan to buy more quantities of products like pork, rice, condiments and seasonings.

Teresita hopes to grow her business, for she desires to continue helping her relatives who are in need. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients like rice, pork, chicken and vegetables and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university bills.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith, a married mother of three, describes herself as ambitious. For four years now, she has been selling beauty products from a retail shop located in a busy area. Her primary customers are locals. 

Judith will use this Kes 20,000 loan to buy more beauty products. Her business goal is to own a boutique and a classic salon within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be able to sustain her family.

loans.use: buy more beauty products to sell

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan has enriched her business. She was able to buy products and supplies that are needed in her business. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenditures.

She is very positive that she could improve her business more if you will let her borrow 50,000 PHP again. This new loan will go to buy additional supplies she needs in her rug-making business. Simultaneously, she can sustain the needs of her family through the help of this assistance.

Merlyn wants her business to become bigger and sustainable. She dreams of reaching other markets and trading centers to export her products. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for raw supplies needed in her rug-making business.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.en:
Edwin is a modest and hardworking farmworker with the drive and tenacity typical of rural men and women. He's a man with an entrepreneurial mindset who learned at a very young age all the farm tasks like crops and raising animals--so much so that he currently has his own maize farm, dairy animals and vegetables crops. He sells the food in the market plaza in a nearby town.

Edwin’s goal is to expand his crops and improve the ones he currently has, so he's requesting the help of a loan to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer.

The loan will allow Edwin to make progress as an entrepreneur and as a person, as well to increase his income and keep on contributing to the support of his household. The only thing he wants is to be able to improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizer

loans.name: Amarelys

texts.es:
Amarelys es una mujer casada de 43 años de edad dedicada a la venta de mercancía por catálogo, aprendió sola de este negocio y lo emplea por necesidad económica pues en el sector de Sincelejo una de las zonas más pobres de Colombia hay pocas oportunidades para trabajar y buscar un mejor futuro.
Este sector pone constantemente a prueba sus habitantes pues para vivir, comer tiene que buscarse sus propios medios dado que no hay oportunidades.
Esta emprendedora mujer quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido por catálogo, ropa, perfumería, vitrina y accesorios con el objetivo de obtener una mejor rentabilidad a pedir en cantidades considerables.
Apoya esta mujer que busca salir de la pobreza, mejorar sus condiciones de vivienda y tener una vida digna.
texts.en:
Amarelys is a 43-year-old, married woman that makes a living selling catalogue merchandise. She taught herself the business and does it out economic necessity as the Sincelejo area is one of the poorest zones in Colombia and there are few opportunities to work and create a better future. 

Residents in this sector are constantly challenged as they have to find their own means to live and eat as there are no other opportunities.

This entrepreneurial woman is asking for a loan to purchase an assortment of catalogues, clothing, perfumes, a display case and accessories in order to get a better return by ordering greater quantities.

Help this woman overcome poverty, improve her living conditions and make a decent living.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of catalogues, clothing, perfumes, display case and accessories.

loans.name: Sreyla

texts.en:
Sreyla is a 21-year-old married homemaker with a one-year-old child living in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. Before having the baby, she ran a grocery store. Her husband, a worker, is 24 years old and earns $10 a day. 

To help improve her family's finances, Sreyla is requesting a loan to buy groceries to sell. This will enable her to generate more income and improve her family’s living conditions. 

Sreyla's plans include building a new house and supporting her child through high school.

loans.use: to buy groceries to sell

loans.name: Erly

texts.es:
Erly es una estudiante que esta esforzándose por dar a las demás personas un buen servicio por medio de sus conocimientos en el área que ha elegido, es una persona muy luchadora y emprendedora, que quiere salir adelante. Comenta que su prestamo anterior le ha sido de mucha ayuda en sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir estudiando.
texts.en: Erly is a student who is working hard to give other people good service through her knowledge in the area she has selected. She is a very determined and enterprising person who wants to get ahead. She comments that the previous loan was a great help in her studies. She asks for this loan to be able to pay her program fees and continue studying. the

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Joseph

texts.en:
Joseph is a married man. He has 2 children, ages 3 years and 7 years. He describes himself to be ambitious. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. 

His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high cost of fuel. 

He will use the Kes 35,000 loan to buy a stock of sugar, bread, flour and other items to start a retail shop for his wife. His business goal is to own a big retail shop within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will be able to educate his children. 

This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance bank. His previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy a stock of sugar, bread, flour and other items to start a retail shop for his wife.

loans.name: Ada

texts.es:
Ada es de la ciudad de Villarrica, esta estudiando la carrera de contabilidad, y a través de estos estudios le gustaría poder volverse independiente algún día.
Es una estudiante muy sacrificada que pone todo de sí para poder ser alguien en la vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera y seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en: Ada is from Villarrica city. She is studying accounting and through these studies she would like to become self-sufficient one day. She is a student who sacrifices everything she can in order to one day be somebody.  She seeks this loan to be able to pay the payments for her career education and continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university tuition payments.

loans.name: Madina

texts.en:
Madina lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with five children, and all of them go to school. She has no additional family members. 

She sells charcoal from home. She operates her business on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. She has been in this business for seven years. She gets additional income from rental houses.

She has requested a loan of 1,200,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy bags of charcoal. Her major challenges include transportation and seasonality. Her goal and aspiration is to build more rental houses. 

She has her own house, where the family has no access to electricity but does have piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Olga Cecilia

texts.es:
Olga es una mujer que se encuentra civilmente separada de su esposo, quedo a cardo de 2 princesas de 19 y 6 años de edad, tiene su negocio de venta de helados, actividad que aprendió de su excuñado.
Esta amable y sonriente mujer busca crecer y fortalecer su negocio, deposita todo de ella en su heladería, si es necesario trasnochara, trabajara largas jornadas pero quiere hacer de este negocio su medio de sostenimiento.
Es por este deseo de superación y de querer triunfar que quiere solicitar un crédito que invertirá en lo siguiente: enchapar el baño, que es un requisito sanitario que le exigen, comprar una carpa para poner silletería afuera, reparar la iluminación que se le averió.
Olga sueña con pagar la educación de sus hijos, un día dejar el negocio a sus hijos y buscar siempre mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para tener una vida más digna.
texts.en:
Olga is a woman who is separated from her husband. She has two princesses, aged 19 and 6, in her care. She has an ice-cream shop. She learnt how to do this work from her former brother-in-law.

This kind and smiling woman seeks to enlarge and strengthen her business. She puts everything into her ice-cream shop. If necessary, she will pull all-nighters and work long days, but she wants to make this business her means of supporting herself.

It is because she wants to succeed and triumph that she is requesting a loan. She will invest it in the following: tiling the bathroom, which is a health and safety requirement; buying an awning so she can put seating outside; and repairing the lighting, which got damaged.

Olga dreams of paying for her children’s education, of one day leaving the business to her children, and of always improving her living conditions so they can have a more decent life.

loans.use: to tile the bathroom and buy an awning so she can have seating outside

loans.name: Cesar Mario

texts.es:
El señor Cesar tiene gran experiencia en el área de carnicería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia carnicería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.
Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm
Actualmente necesita un auxilio para comprar cerdos y así poder abastecer su negocio con más carne.
El préstamo le permitirá trabajar con un mejor inventario.
Su mayor sueño es poder tener un negocio mucho más grande.
Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más organizada.
texts.en: Cesar has a lot of experience as a butcher. Some time ago he opened his own butcher shop and  it has always generated very good results. He has always preferred to work independently. He works every day from 8 AM until 9 PM. Today he needs help to buy pigs and in this way be able to stock his business with more meat. The loan will enable him to work with a better inventory. His main dream is to be able to have a much larger business. With this help he will be able to work in a more organized manner.

loans.use: to buy pigs in order to stock his business with meat, which customers ask for daily.

loans.name: Olga Ines

texts.es:
Olga es una mujer de experiencia, sabiduría y mucha paciencia.
Es madre de 3 hijos y ha trabajado prácticamente toda su vida para sacarlos adelante.
Ella tiene un pequeño restaurante en el que vende mucha cantidad de alimentos.
Trabaja todos los días de 5:00 Am  a 3:00 Pm para tener su producto listo y fresco para sus clientes que en su mayoría son los vecinos del sector donde vive.
Ella desea capitalizar su negocio y tener un gran avance de insumos e inventario de productos, por eso acude a un préstamo para comprar insumos para su producción de alimentos y comprar una carpa para su negocio.

Una de sus principales dificultades es la falta de dinero para invertir en su negocio pero confía en la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y el buen corazón de los prestamistas de Kiva para sacar su actividad adelante.
texts.en:
Olga is a woman of experience, wisdom, and a lot of patience.

She is the mother of 3 children and has worked practically her whole life to get them ahead.

She has a small restaurant where she sells a large quantity of food.

She works every day from 5:00 am to 3:00 pm to have her products ready and fresh for her customers who, in the majority, are the neighbors of the sector where she lives. 

She wants to capitalize on her business and have a great advance of supplies and inventory of her products, so she requests a loan to purchase supplies of her food production and to purchase an awning for her business.

One of her primary difficulties is the lack of money to invest in her business, but she trusts in the help of the Interactuar corporation and the good hearts of the Kiva lenders to get her business ahead.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her food production and purchase an awning for her business, looking to capitalize on her business.

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia es una hermosa morena de 22 años de edad, radiante en belleza y juventud y con gran sentido por el trabajo independiente y es que gracias a su cafetería puede generar el capital para pagar sus estudios universitarios y apoyar a su madre.
Su negocio es heredado por su familia y en el momento es el único en su barrio, aprendió su actividad gracias a sus padres y le han dado la confianza para administrar.
Por ello tiene muchas ideas para mejorar el negocio familiar, innovarlo con ideas frescas, Natalia quiere expandir el local, ofrecer un producto nuevo, mejorar sus ventas y calidad de servicio, para ello solicita un crédito para invertir en un cafetera y surtido de alimentos entre panadería y fritos.
texts.en:
Natalia, 22, is a pretty brunette, radiant with beauty and youth and with a strong sense for working on her own.  Thanks to her cafe, she's able to earn the money to pay for her college education and support her mother.

She inherited her business from her family and it's the only one in her neighborhood at the moment.  She learned her job thanks to her parents, who gave her the confidence to run it.

Consequently she has a lot of ideas for improving the family business, updating it with fresh ideas.  Natalia wants to expand the retail space, offer a new product, and improve her sales and the quality of her service.  That's why she's requesting a loan to buy a coffee maker and a supply of food, from baked goods to fried food.

loans.use: to invest in a coffee maker and a supply of food to accompany her beverages.  She wants to pay for her education

loans.name: Esther Zenaida

texts.es:
Esther es una mujer humilde y trabajadora que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Dabeiba desde donde se desempeña espectacularmente en la cocina ya que su negocio es la preparación de comidas por encargo como lo son los tamales, chorizos, empanadas, arepas, entre otros.

Estos alimentos los venden principalmente a vecinos del sector quienes conocen la sazón de Esther y saben que siempre obtendrán alimentos deliciosos y muy bien preparados.

Esther desea aumentar su venta de alimentos y desea trabajar de una manera más cómoda, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de algunos utensilios de cocina y compra de insumos para continuar realizando sus recetas como pollos, harina, queso, entre otros.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia, oportunidad que le brinda la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
Esther is a humble and hard-working woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to the care of her children. She lives in the municipality of Dabeiba from where she works spectacularly in the kitchen since her business is preparing dishes by advance orders such as tamales, chorizos [sausages], empanadas, and arepas [corn pancakes], among others. 

She sells these foods primarily to neighbors in the area who know Esther's flavor and know that they will always get delicious food that is very well prepared. 

Esther wants to increase her food sales and wants to work more comfortably, for this reason she asks for a loan to purchase some kitchen utensils and purchase the supplies to continue making her recipes with chicken, flour, and cheese, among others.

This loan will allow her to get her business ahead to get, in turn, the necessary income that will give her the opportunity to continue sustaining her family , an opportunity that the Interactuar corporation offers her.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen utensils and supplies to prepare dishes with chicken and flour.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an oven and start a business selling clothing in his search to have a better quality of life.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase stylish and new women's clothes, accessories, perfumes, and other items for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase some construction materials to renovate the bedroom.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Nidia

texts.es:
Nidia se desempeña como secretaria, y comenta que está cursando el tercer año de la Carrera de Fisioterapia. Su aspiración es seguir enriqueciendo sus conocimientos profesionales y dedicarse a su profesión.
Ella quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas y ser útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Nidia is working as a secretary and says that she is in her third year of a physical therapy program. Her aspiration is to continue enriching her professional knowledge and work in her profession.

She wants to be able to help other people and be useful to society. 

She asks for this loan to be able to cover the costs of her program, in order to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es de la Ciudad de Villarrica, es una persona trabajadora que quiere progresar, tiene una familia que trabajan a diario para salir adelante. 
De aquí a poco tiempo aspira ser un gran contador, salir adelante y dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Es una persona que se está esforzando bastante.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos de titulación, de manera a poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene.
texts.en: Jorge is from the city of Villarrica.  He is a hardworking person who wants to advance in life.  He has a family that works everyday in order to get ahead.  In the near future he wants to be a great accountant, get headband give his family a better quality of life.  He is a person who is striving a lot.  He is seeking a loan in order to pay his college tuition.

loans.use: pay his college tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Eradio

texts.es:
Eradio vive con sus padres y sus cinco hermanos, es una familia trabajadora y humilde que lucha para salir adelante.
Estudia la carrera de análisis de sistemas para ser alguien en la vida, un profesional, salir adelante y tener una vida tranquila y ayudar a su familia para que no les falte nada y para seguir progresando. Su meta es ser un buen profesional y capacitarse cada día más.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera.
texts.en: Eradio lives with his parents and five siblings in a hard-working and humble family that fights to get ahead. He is studying a career in systems analysis in order to become somebody in life, a professional, to get ahead and have a tranquil life and hep his family so that they have what they need and can continue growing. His goal is to be a good professional and every day learn more. He seeks this loan to be able to pay for university tuition for his studies.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es de la ciudad de Villarrica, comenta que está estudiando la carrera de odontología, el cual siempre fue su meta.
Sus padres siempre lo han apoyado en todo, y siempre han sido su sostén. Su meta es ser especialista en su profesión de manera para desempeñar su labor con eficiencia.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma seguir creciendo como persona.
texts.en: Jorge is from the city of Villarrica.  He is currently studying to be a dentist, which has always been his goal.  His parents have always supported him in everything that he has done, and they have always provided for him.  His goal is to specialize within his career so that he can carry out his work efficiently.  He is seeking this loan in order to pay for his tuition so that he can continue growing as a person.

loans.use: pay his college tuition.

loans.name: Benar

texts.en:
Benar lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with four children; two go to school. She takes care of additional family members. Benar operates a retail shop at the market, and she has been in this business for the last 21 years. She works seven days a week. She gets additional income from rental houses. 

She has requested a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO, to buy boxes of soap, cooking oil, sugar, rice, beans, and flour. Her major challenges include transportation and seasonality. She aspires to buy land for farming purposes. She lives in her own house, and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her major expenses include food and school fees.

loans.use: To buy boxes of soap, cooking oil, sugar, rice, flour, peas

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is a sari-sari (variety) store owner from Iloilo, Philippines. She is 54 years old, is married, and has three children. Nilda runs both the sari-sari store and a carinderia (eatery), which have been the source of her income for more than 20 years now. She works hard to earn an income so that she can support her husband in meeting the needs of the family, especially their children's schooling.

Nilda is asking for a loan to buy more ingredients for her eatery such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and rice and to buy stock for the store such as canned goods, noodles, soap, and toiletries. This loan will enable Nilda to improve her store's inventory and to cook more food to sell to her customers. In the future, she  hopes to make her business more sustainable and profitable.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for her eatery such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and rice and to buy stock for the store such as canned goods, noodles, soap, and toiletries

loans.name: Onesmus

texts.en:
Onesmus has an auto spare-parts shop in Eldoret town, and has been running this business for four years. He is 32 years old, married, and together with his spouse they have been blessed with one child. 

He will use this loan to buy spare parts to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to expand his business. This is his third loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and he paid his previous loan successfully. 

In the future, he hopes to have a prosperous business and a happy family.

loans.use: To buy more stock of spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Jenniffer Patricia

texts.es:
Jenniffer es una joven emprendedora y dinámica de 28 años de edad, estudiante universitaria y comerciante independiente; ya que desde hace 11 meses comenzó a vender mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y compañeros de la universidad, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar y para pagar sus estudios.

El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues invertirá el dinero en la compra de surtido al por mayor como jeans, camisas, camisetas, entre otros, brindando mayor variedad y un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que hará más rentable su negocio.

Jenniffer tiene el firme propósito de sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, pues quiere convertirse en una empresaria exitosa y garantizar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para su grupo familiar y sabe que con los prestamistas de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar puede lograr todo eso y más.
texts.en:
Jenniffer is an enterprising and dynamic young woman, 28 years old, a university student and independent businesswoman, since 11 months ago she began to sell merchandise to family members, friends and classmates at the university, with the end to generate income to support the household economy and to pay for her studies.

The loan that she is asking for is a support to strengthen her business, since she will invest the money in the purchase of a bulk selection such as jeans, shirts, and t-shirts, among others, offering a better variety and better customer service, which will make her business more profitable. 

Jenniffer has the firm objective to get her productive project ahead, since she wants to become a successful businesswoman and guarantee a better quality of life and well-being for her family and she knows that with the Kiva lenders and the Interactuar corporation, she can achieve all this and more.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of women's and men's clothing, and with this capital, pay for her university studies.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El Comité llamado Mujeres Unidas están iniciando el 1er ciclo, con muchas expectativas de poder mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia, lleva ese nombre ya que todas son unidas y solidarias las unas con las otras.
Elena es parte de este grupo, se dedica a la venta de prendas de manera ambulante, y comenta que todos los días recorre para poder ir teniendo un mejor ingreso y agrandar su clientela.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas varias para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The committee called "Mujeres Unidas" is starting its first cycle, with many expectations of being able to improve their lives and the lives of their families. They took this name as they are all united and in solidarity with each other.

Elena is part of this group. She sells items of clothing as a street vendor. She comments that every day she is out in order to be able to have a better income and expand her customers. She seeks this loan to be able to buy various articles of clothing to sell in order to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy articles of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres Trabajadoras está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, cada una de ellas quiere ir creciendo en su microemprendimiento.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Evelyn, quien se dedica a hacer manicura, es muy buena en lo que hace, es por eso que ya tiene una muy buena clientela que siempre le pide sus servicios. Ella esta poniendo su mejor esfuerzo para ir capacitándose y crecer.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de esmaltes, acetonas, algodones, alicates y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The group called "Mujeres Trabajadoras" is in its 4th cycle in the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to be successful. Each one of them wants to grow her respective microbusiness.

One of the members is Evelyn, who does manicures. She is very good at what she does, and therefore she has a good customer base that always asks for her services. She is putting forth her best effort to learn and grow. She asks for a loan to be able to buy nail polish, polish remover, cotton balls, nail trimmers, and other items to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy nail polish, polish remover, cotton balls, nail trimmers, and other items.

loans.name: Melba

texts.en:
Melba owns and manages a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells various merchandise, ranging from noodles, eggs, biscuits, sugar, toothpaste, soy sauce, and canned goods. She is a 57-year-old married woman with eleven dependents. Three of her children are still attending school. She lives in Mcarthur, Leyte. She also goes fishing to earn additional income.

Melba has requested a loan of 40,000 PHP to buy to supplies for the store and fishing materials like fishing net. She could now display a variety of stock and in the coming months, her ongoing catch will improve. In this way, she could roll back her capital to possible business ventures that will probably help earn more.

 In the future, Melba would like to expand her business to be successful, and this could be the way to continue to support the education of her three children.

loans.use: to buy to supplies for the store and fishing materials like fishing net

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed with seven children, one of whom attends school. She is looking after another family member. She has been selling used clothes in the market at retail for 11 years, working six days a week. She generates additional income from rental rooms. 

She has requested a loan of Ugandan Shillings 2,000,000 from Kiva partner MCDT- SACCO, in order to enable her to stock more bales of used clothes to sell. Her challenges include seasonality and defaulters. Her dream is to open up another stall in the market for used clothes. She joined MCDT-SACCO because of the relatively low interest charged on loans. She resides in a house with access to both electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy bales of used clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her son's school expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase medicine.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba es una mujer de 43 años de edad, soltera, cabeza de familia su hijo tiene 11 años es un joven sano, que espera para navidad el famoso traído de Santa Claus.
Con la ayuda de su tienda ha podido generar los recursos suficientes para sostenerse y da empleo a una hermana.
Rosalba quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido de la canasta familiar y busca con el crédito mejorar sus ventas y así cumplir los deseos de su hijo
texts.en:
Rosalba, 43, is single and a head of household.  Her son, 11, is a healthy young man who's waiting for the famous gifts of Santa Claus.  Her store has helped her be able to earn enough money to support herself and give her sister a job.

Rosalba wants to request a loan to buy supplies from the family shopping basket.  With the loan she hopes to improve her sales and, consequently, fulfill her son's wishes.

loans.use: to buy a supply of staples, grains, groceries, and beverages to improve her offerings

loans.name: Jorge Orlando

texts.es:
Jorge Orlando tiene 63 años de edad, es soltero, sin hijos, vive en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, costa norte de Perú. Su comunidad está dedicada básicamente a la agricultura, ganadería y al comercio.

Jorge Orlando se desempeña como mototaxista, con más de 10 años de experiencia brindando este servicio, sus servicios los brinda dentro la zona geográfica de Oyotún, él solicita préstamo para mantenimiento de su mototaxi(cambio de llantas, carpa, entre otros), dicha inversión le servirá para poder asegurar el correcto funcionamiento de su herramienta de trabajo y así poder brindar un mejor servicio, con gran influencia en el negocio; Jorge Orlando piensa tener en mejores condiciones su mototaxi para poder seguir satisfaciendo de la mejor manera la demanda de dicho servicio en la zona. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge Orlando is 63 years old and is single with no children. He lives in a rural area in the district of Oyotún in the province of Chiclayo, in the Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. The people in his community essentially work in agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Jorge Orlando works as a mototaxi driver and has 10 years' experience in providing this service. He offers his services in the Oyotún geographical area.

He is asking for the loan to carry out maintenance on his mototaxi (replacing the tyres and tarpaulin among other things). This investment will help him to ensure his working vehicle is in good working order and so he will be able to provide a better service, which will have a big impact on his business.

Jorge Orlando hopes to get his mototaxi into a better condition so that he can continue to provide the best service possible to meet the need for this service in the area. This will enable him to improve his income in the short term, increase his profits and so improve his own and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to carry out maintenance on his mototaxi.

loans.name: Nara

texts.en:
Nara lives with her family in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. She is 38 years old and she had a vocational education. 

Her husband works at the city State Art College as a choreographer. They have two pretty daughters. The elder is a student of the Theatrical Institute at the faculty of dancing art, and simultaneously she works at the folk song and dance ensemble. She both nicely sings and perfectly dances. 

Nara’s second daughter is still school-age and she is also a very artistic person. Nara works at the same Folk Song and Dance Ensemble, in the dressing room where she takes care of the costumes. 

Nara’s elder daughter is going to be going on tours and these tours are very significant for the start of her theatrical career. Nara wants to make a present for the New Year to her sweet daughters.

Nara asks for this loan as she wants to buy a computer for her daughters, and she will also use some part of the loan amount for the condition of her elder daughter’s costumes for her coming tours.

loans.use: to buy a computer for her daughters, and she will also use some part of the loan amount for the  condition of her elder daughter’s costumes for her coming tours.

loans.name: Jaime De Jesus

texts.es:
El señor Jaime es un mecánico de motos y carros muy experimentado. Ha adquirido muchas habilidades a través de pequeños estudios en diferentes academias y otra parte la ha aprendido empíricamente.
Adicional a su labor como mecánico también tiene un pequeño almacén de venta de repuestos automotrices en el cual ofrece distintos tipos de repuestos en diferentes marcas.
Es un hombre muy trabajador y honrado que conoce el significado que tienen los automóviles para sus dueños y es por esto que siempre trata de ofrecer un excelente servicio, de buena calidad y de una manera eficiente.
El solicita un préstamo para surtir su almacén con gran cantidad de repuestos, de este modo podrá tener los productos disponibles para sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jaime is a very experienced motorcycle and car mechanic. He got many of his skills through short courses in different schools and another part he learned from hands-on experience.

In addition to his work as a mechanic, he also has a small store where he sells car parts in which he offers different types of parts of different brands.

He is a very hard-working and honest man who knows the significance that the cars have for their owners and it is for this that he always tries to offer excellent service, of good quality in an efficient way.

He asks for a loan to stock his store with a lot of parts, and in this way he will be able to have the products available for his customers.

loans.use: to stock his store with a variety of motorcycle parts of all brands, with this he earns the sustenance for his family.

loans.name: Melchor Jr

texts.en:
Melchor Jr. operates a welding shop. He is a 39-year-old married man with eight children residing in the town of Mcarthur, Leyte. His youngest child is 5 years old. He is also an all-around carpenter.

He is asking for a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy a welding machine and to use as additional capital for the start up of a sari-sari (variety) store. This could be a great help especially in supplying daily services to his respective customers. 

In a few months, Melchor Jr. wants to open a small store that will help him augment his income, thus providing the needs of his growing children, including sending his children to school.

Melchor Jr. would like to expand his current business and to be successful. He dreams of having a welding shop in the future.

loans.use: to buy a welding machine and to use as additional capital for the start up of a sari-sari (variety) store.

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es:
Deyanira de 47 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital, esta mujer inició con un negocio de tienda de abarrotes.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido de productos de la canasta familiar para abastecer su negocio. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica, poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias y garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Deyanira, 47 years old, has earned the affection of all her neighbors for her friendliness and her good sense of humor. She loves her family, which is the primary driving force to struggle every day and generate the sustenance to survive.

Although she didn't have the resources to open a business, this was not an impediment to achieve her dream of becoming a businesswoman; with a little capital, this woman opened her grocery store business. 

Her dreams didn't stop and for this reason she finds herself asking for a loan to invest in the purchase of an assortment of pantry staples to stock her business.  

He hopes to be able to improve her economic condition, to be able to have an old age without financial worries and guarantee her family a better future.

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of pantry staples to stock her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase construction materials to renovate the house from the inside.

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es:
Ruben es de la ciudad de Santaní, esta estudiando la carrera de ingeniería agrónoma, es muy dedicado al estudio, es una persona que desea salir adelante con sus esfuerzos para alcanzar sus metas. 
Su meta es tener su título Universitario y poder trabajar de forma independiente además enseñar en las Universidades para poder seguir creciendo.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de su carrera.
texts.en:
Ruben is from the city of Santaní and he is studying an agricultural engineering program. He is very dedicated to his studies; he is a person who wants to get ahead with his efforts to achieve his goals. 

His goal is to have his university degree and be able to work independently and, in addition, to teach at universities to be able to continue growing.

He asks for this loan to be able to pay the fees for his program.

loans.use: to pay program fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase blocks, cement, sand, iron and gravel.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cinder blocks, cement, sand, and gravel

loans.name: Villa Del Sol Group

texts.es:
El grupo se unió con varios vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Asunción, ellas son mujeres jefas de familia, que decidieron tomar las riendas y poder luchar.
La Sra. Mirtha es una de las que integra este grupo, es una mujer muy trabajadora, que con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo esta pudiendo salir adelante y ayudar a su familia y sus seres queridos. Ella se dedica a hacer comidas, las cuales son muy ricas, y con esto se gana la vida de una manera honesta.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de carne, verduras, condimentos, pollo, y otros, para seguir haciendo las delicias que prepara y seguir deleitando a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The group is made up of various neighbors and friends from the city of Asunción. They are female heads of household who decided to take the reins to fight.

Mirtha is one of the members of the group. She is a hardworking woman who through a lot of sacrifice and struggle is supporting and helping her family and loved ones. She works making meals, which are very tasty, and this is how she earns a living in an honest way.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy meat, vegetables, seasonings, chicken, and more, in order to continue making the delicacies that she prepares and continue delighting her customers.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, seasonings, chicken, and more.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase another camera and supplies to make frames.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es: Luis tiene 52 años de edad y junto a su esposa mantienen la economía de su hogar. Luis se gana la vida por medio de la crianza y venta de gallinas y por medio de la prestación de sus servicios de albañilería. ÉL es un hombre visionario y con el deseo de dar mejores condiciones habitacionales solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios para construir la cocina. Con el monto solicitado comprará: cemento, arena, ladrillo, y lámina.
texts.en: Luis is 52 years old and along with his wife they economically support their home. Luis works raising and selling chickens and by renting his services as a bricklayer.  He is a visionary man with the desire to give the best living conditions so he seeks a loan from FUSAI to invest in buying the materials h needs to build a kitchen. With the loan he will buy cement, sand, brick, and laminate.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, brick, and laminate in order to build a kitchen.

loans.name: Joelar

texts.en:
Joelar is a fisherman from Iloilo, Philippines. He is 41 years old, married and has four children. Joelar has been in the fishing business for more than 16 years now. Fishing is a lucrative business in his place.

Joelar is requesting a loan to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other items. This loan will help him improve his catch, thus allowing him to sell more fish to the market.

In the future, Joelar hopes to make his business a success. Moreover, he wants to save money for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets, lead weights, hooks and other items

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, chicken, and vegetables for her tamale sales in order to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of pigs to raise and later sell in order to be able to continue providing for the household.

loans.name: Yuri Andrea

texts.es:
Yuri se dedica a la venta de mercancía una actividad que aprendió sola y por necesidad de generar recursos pues tiene dos hijos de 9 y 5 años de edad, inocentes, tiernos que tiene la creencia en que Santa Claus les traerá un obsequio en noche buena.
Yuri entre su mercancía vende lociones, relojes, manilas, collares, gafas de sol etc. Y todos ellos los tiene en una vitrina que saca todos los días.
Yuri  busca incrementar su utilidad, su movimiento de clientes, sus ventas y lo hará comprando mercancía con la ayuda de un crédito pues su idea es seguir teniendo la vitrina pero ofrecer productos que pueden pagar después para darle formas de pago a sus clientes.
El crédito lo invertirá en lociones, gafas de sol, y relojes, Yuri espera tu ayuda, para alegrar la navidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Yuri sells merchandise. She learned this trade on her own because she needed to generate income for her two children, ages 9 and 5. They are innocent and sincere in their belief that Santa Claus will deliver a gift on Christmas Eve.

The merchandise that Yuri sells includes lotions, watches, bracelets, necklaces, sunglasses, and other items. Everything is kept in a display cabinet that is available each day for everyone to view.

Yuri is looking to increase her profits, her customer traffic, and her sales. She will buy more merchandise with the help of this loan. Yuri will continue to display her products but allow her customers to pay for their goods afterwards by giving options to them.

This loan will be invested in lotions, sunglasses, and watches. Yuri awaits assistance so that she can brighten her family’s Christmas.

loans.use: to buy lotions, sunglasses, and watches to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Khamala Ursula

texts.en:
Her name is Khamala Ursula, 28, resident of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. She is married to Raymundo and they have three children who are still at the Elementary Level in school. She works hard to meet their daily household needs and for the schooling of her children.  

Khamala Ursula is into a food business. She has had a small food stall for a number of years already. In the Philippines, a food stall is a common sight, especially in populated areas.  Working class people usually buy their meals at food stalls, sold at reasonable prices, for convenience and to save money, rather than cook at home.
